description:
An additional scenario for the War Chronicles mode of the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

â–¼War Chronicles scenario
The Battle for Hebei

Background:
A scenario where Cao Cao, Yuan Shang, and Yuan Tan fight to take control of Hebei.
Cao Cao's army enters the newly occupied Ye and is on the verge of cornering the armies of Yuan Shang and Yuan Tan. Numerous obstacles lie ahead to suppress Hebei, so be sure to overcome them with the plentiful military strength.
Yuan Shang's army is driven away from Ye and sets base in Beiping. Military power will drastically improve once reinforcements arrive from the Wuhuan.
Yuan Tan's army, based in Pingyuan, lacks in military strength. Keep surviving and wait for the right opportunity to launch a counteroffensive.
name: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 3rd Wave: "The Battle for Hebei"
